
### inefficiencies  {.smaller}


* if a row doesn't fit in cache --- <br> cache effectively holds <em>one element</em> 

   * everything else --- too much other stuff between accesses
 
<hr class="vspace" />
* if a row does fit in cache --- <br> cache effectively holds <em>one row + one element</em>  

   * everything else --- too much other stuff between accesses
